title: House Industries Releases Burbank, A New Font Collection
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122042/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 1.Feb.2007 11.54am 

ANNOUNCING BURBANK, WHERE TYPOGRAPHY MEETS ANIMATION

Back in the prehistoric period before 2007, animated typefaces  
tended to be drawn as single stand-alone fonts. They rarely had  
relatives and scarcely had a supporting cast, causing  
short-sighted typesetters to seldom use them for much more than  
featherbrained frivolity. Enter Burbank, a coordinated collection  
of 20 fonts, hand hewn to handle tasks from big to small, wide to  
condensed, light to black and countless styles in between. Burbank  
is ready for anything from hyperbolic headlines on outdoor  
billboards and in major magazines to miniscule matters in tiny  
classified advertisements. Buy it now!

[http://www.houseind.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122042/http:/www.houseind.com/ "http://www.houseind.com/")

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

ALEXANDER GIRARD ALPHABLOCK COLLECTION AVAILABLE NOW

Check out our new Alexander Girard Alphablock Collection, a set of  
28 wood blocks featuring alphabets and graphics that pay tribute  
to the renowned mid-century designer.

[http://www.houseind.com/girard](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122042/http:/www.houseind.com/girard "http://www.houseind.com/girard")

Inspired by Girard’s work and its lasting influence, we’re  
developing a collection of typestyles and graphics that will be  
released in Spring 2007 as the Alexander Girard Font Collection.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

HOUSE33 ONLINE SHOP NOW OPEN

Super slimey octo thirty three goose down fisher strip custom cord  
duck made in the USA gear awaits you at the House33 online store as  
well as at 40 fine haberdashers worldwide.

[http://store.house33.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122042/http:/store.house33.com/ "http://store.house33.com/")
author: paul d hunt
